text: Makruh (مَكْرُوهٌ) is stuff that is considered disliked in Islam.http://www.learnaboutislam.net/wp-content/uploads/2020/03/Meaning-of- makrooh.pdf Examples of some actions that are considered Makruh include wearing black (some scholars and under certain conditions),https://www.al- islam.org/ask/is-it-haram-makruh-or-recommended-to-wear-black-shoes masturbation (some scholars),https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=LANUHY3HaVY and smoking (some scholars).https://islamqa.org/hanafi/mahmoodiyah/53779/is- smoking-haraam-or-makrooh ==References== Category:Islam
title: Makruh
